channel.title: I need a really small gif
channel.description:
i need it to look like this but it needs to be only 26 pixels in length and width and i need it animated...
this works if its shrunk...and maybe sped up a little...
[IMG]http://i167.photobucket.com/albums/u125/deoxys505/Untitled-1.gif[/img]
thanks ahead of time... i suck with photoshop and its kinda hard even tho i have a friend who knows a little photoshop...(we cant do it...)
thanks!!
